messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR GRAHAM STUART

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working hard to bring a new hospital to the constituency.
Making sure flooding and coastal erosion are top priorities.

mentions.candidate: We can’t go on like this. We need change to put Britain back on its feet. - David Cameron

issues.education: Strive to improve the education standards.
issues.environment: Working hard to make sure flooding and coastal erosion are top priorities.
issues.health: Working hard to bring a new hospital to the constituency.

politicalExperience.achievements: One of the hardest working MPs.
